nodes.text: Damonite Yors-B was a cold, icy planet in the Meridian sector that was a possible location of Princess Leia during her kidnapping nine years after the Battle of Endor.

The Death Seed plague-infested Corbantis was disposed of by Seti Ashgad on Damonite Yors-B, but seventeen members of the ship's crew survived by huddling around the ship's reactor core: the radiation killed off the droch infecting them. These seventeen were rescued by Han Solo and Lando Calrissian. They were taken to Nim Drovis and treated by the Ho'Din Dr. Ism Oolos.
